message: It was weird as hell, this guy was legitimately confused that people read harry potter
had someone say to me today, "people actually read fiction books".  wtf
I can get choosing not to read fiction yourself, but being surprised that other people do?
"I don't read fiction. I find it a waste of time. There are so many amazing things that are real; I don't need to spend any time on a made-up story." — Jason Fried
and I suppose he doesn't watch fictional movies or tv shows either
There's Important Work to be done
My only problem with fiction is that it makes me angry I can't do things like travel to other planets
